title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi 3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, push, list, delete models.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; identical API surface to JS client for chat, generate, embeddings, etc.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer exposing Ollama models as LangChain LLMs, chat, and embedding endpoints.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, embeddings, model ops.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI chat with Ollama, conversation history, markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain to chat with your documents.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for the Ollama JavaScript client (same repo as ollama-js).

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package for the Ollama Python client (same repo as ollama-python).

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama; chat, generate, embeddings, model ops.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama; supports chat, completions, embeddings, streaming.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings any Ollama model to your server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that exposes Ollama models via @ mentions or slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for summarization, rewrite, and Q&A on notes.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rust-sdk
summary: Published Rust crate mirroring the official clients; async/await, streaming, embeddings.

title: ollama-model-gallery
summary: Community-curated collection of Modelfiles and tips for running niche models with Ollama.
